Original:
極好的！我喜歡這個地方！這絕對是完美的。優秀的演講。優質的服務。優秀的導師。我和幾個朋友參加了基礎的「調酒」課程，我們度過了一生中最美好的時光。有趣的價值在那裡，教育價值也在那裡。

克萊爾，我們的教練簡直是最好的。空間相當寬敞，最多可容納12-16人。保存得很好。設計精良，與正常零售服務區分開。光線充足，通風良好。

在這一天，我們製作了 3 種琴酒飲料：琴酒、蜂膝酒、長島冰茶。必須練習一些攪拌、搖晃、傾倒技巧。所有合適的眼鏡和設備均完好無損。

可以肯定地說我會再去那裡😂
EN:
Excellent!I like this place!This is definitely perfect.Excellent speech.High -quality service.Excellent mentor.A few friends and I participated in the basic "bartending" course, and we spent the best time in our lives.The interesting value is there, and the value of educational value is there.

Claire, our coach is the best.The space is quite spacious and can accommodate up to 12-16 people.Save well.The design is well -designed and distinguished from normal retail services.Extremely light and good ventilation.

On this day, we made 3 kinds of piano wine beverages: piano wine, bee -knee wine, and long island ice tea.You must practice some stirring, shaking, and dumping skills.All appropriate glasses and equipment are intact.

You can say certain I will go there again

Original:
請問櫃檯的女店員怎麼這麼會沒有耐心呢？

我在收集小樣，上次來買了幾瓶，其中一瓶是紅色骷髏，這次我問說能不能看看有沒有新的小樣，也因為這次活動看起來店裡多了一些新東西，可是店員跟我說「小樣，跟你上次來的時候差不多…」就不理我了，反而是另一位男店員，主動買了幾瓶給我看，其中之一就是我上次沒找到的綠色骷髏。

我問他關於另外一組贈品，所謂的四入牛奶壺是什麼，他只說就是四個跟杯子差不多的塑料做的東西，完全沒有想讓我看的意思。

我這兩次消費都在三千左右，在店裡也沒待10分鐘，當時客人也不多，應該沒造成店家甚麼困擾吧?

女店員一直表現出，「沒事就結帳趕快走吧」的態度，該店空間有限，無法陳列商品。開口問，對方又懶得拿給你看。如果只有一次，我還可以說可能她心情不好，可是如果每次去都要看臉色，求她讓我看看有什麼新貨，那這家店我真的不想再來了。

在網路上，我對癮型人的部落格印象非常好的，可是該位女性門市人員卻毀了這一切。
EN:
How can the female clerk at the counter have no patience?

I was collecting small samples. I bought a few bottles last time, one of which was a red skull. This time I asked if I can see if there is a new sample, and because this activity seems to have some new things in the store, But the clerk told me, "Sample, almost when you came last time ..." I ignored me, but was another male clerk who took the initiative to buy a few bottles for me. One of them was that I didn't find it last time I didn't find it last time Green skeleton.

I asked him about another group of gifts. What is the so -called four -in milk pot. He only said that it was made of four plastics similar to cups. He didn't want to let me see.

My two consumptions were around 3,000 times, and I didn't stay in the store for 10 minutes. At that time, there were not many guests. It should not cause the store to worry about it?

The female clerk has always showed that the attitude of "just checkout at the checkout". The shop has limited space and cannot display the goods.Ask, the other party is too lazy to show you again.If there is only one time, I can still say that she may be in a bad mood, but if you go to look at your face every time, ask her to see what new goods are, then I really don't want to come again.

On the Internet, I was very impressed by the blogger of the addictive person, but the women's store staff ruined it all.
